website_summaries.verdict: Minor quirks aside, if you are looking for a high-quality marula oil in a generous portion that will last, you'd have a hard time finding a better option for a lower price.
pros: Cold-pressed, organic, and virgin marula oil that's pure and cruelty-free
No pesticides used in the growing process
Generates enthusiasm for making skin and hair feel soft and moisturized
A few drops go a long way, plus you get 4 oz
cons: A few users say that the natural scent is harsh
Mixed opinions on the consistency – some say a bit thin, while others found it on the thick side

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Marula Oil
customer_reviews.text: I have combination skin and normally don't like face oil. First time, I tried expensive brand Marula oil, I felt in love with it right away. This oil is amazingly lightweight. I added a few drops with my serum in the morning and night. Only a couple week, I definitely can tell the difference on my skin. It looks more radiant and healthier. Because the price of the famous brand is too expensive for 1 oz, I decided to try this brand instead. The quality is pretty good. It works great on my skin like the same oil and there are no preservatives and no other additives added. Happy deal for me! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Concerns
customer_reviews.text: I'm only giving a 3 vs 5 because of packaging concern. The plastic was not over the cap and not attached to bottle, just around the collar. So, indicated possible tampering exposure. Plus, oil was low... Only to the top of the label, lots of air between level of oil and top, a lot. That worries me that the company sending is emptying some of each to fill other bottles or not legit 100% oil as described.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Tillery

customer_reviews.title: Would not use it for my face perfect for body
customer_reviews.text: I would not use this on my face it was very heavy and have a strong smell it was perfect for the rough patches I had on my arms however I intended it for my face and it was way too thick and heavy for my face
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: I love the way this quickly absorbs and doesn't leave me ...
customer_reviews.text: I was using grapeseed oil on my face, but found that it was too heavy and was starting to make me break out. I love the way this quickly absorbs and doesn't leave me too oily or shiny. I tried Drunk Elephant's Virgin Marula Luxury Facial Oil, which was amazing, but $40 for a .5oz bottle. When I turned the bottle around the only ingredient was this stuff!! My only complaint is that the pump kind of 'spits' at me when i'm using it lately. No big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Naveen

customer_reviews.title: Marula Oil is amazing! It has a light odor
customer_reviews.text: Marula Oil is amazing! It has a light odor, but it absorbs quickly. Way better than Argan oil for oily and combination skin. I apply one pump before my foundation and it helps blend perfectly. Doesn't clog my pores or break me out. This oil has also replaced my night time moisturizer. It helps keep my skin soft and glowing. I am looking forward to the long term results, as I have been using this for about 1 month only. I am really impressed so far. I'll edit my review as more unfolds.
customer_reviews.author: Sidhtini

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results
customer_reviews.text: My skin is flawless. It’s not dry or lined. It’s beautiful! I do a lot for my skin. Each day, I cleanse, exfoliate, use serums to tighten, tone, and brighten my skin, and moisturize my skin. I moisturize my skin with a drop of Marula oil after using the serums and before I put on my face cream. Then, I apply make-up. It looks good all day; it doesn’t hurt that the underlying skin looks great all day. No, this is not the only thing I am using. But, the before and after is that my skin now looks as good at the end of the day as it did when I first washed and moisturized my face.
customer_reviews.author: Innovation Creator

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 55 and I don't look it. I add a few drops of Marula oil with a few drops of Baobab oil to my Cerave nighttime facial moisturizer at night after all my DIY vitamin C & hyaluronic serums. I also spread this on my décolleté, hands, and arms. My skin just drinks this up! Ladies, you DON'T have to pay high prices to keep your skin looking young! Do your research! There are SOOOO many informative recipes out there that show you how to make your own serums AND what oils recommended to add to your daily beauty routine for a fraction of the cost of what you pay at high end stores!
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Gail A.

customer_reviews.title: I am so pleased to have found this
customer_reviews.text: I have been a big fan of Marula Oil for a couple years but have purchased the high priced product not realizing there were others on the market. I am so pleased to have found this. I tried Argan Oil, and it is quite greasy for facial oil. For me Argan is good for hair not face. Marula oil is super lightweight and fast absorbing. I used Retinol at night, so my skin sometimes is easy to get dry. This oil is perfect for my morning routine before my sunscreen. So far I do not have any break outs. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Wutt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect nighttime moisturizer.
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil for my face. I am 59 and people are always asking me what I use on my skin. Really, it’s just this at night! It is just the right lightness, and my face drinks it up. My only complaint is that the pump tube doesn’t quite reach the bottom of the bottle, so for the past few weeks I’ve had to unscrew the top and pour it into my hand at night. That gets a little messy. I wish they’d fix that!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Oil For The Price
customer_reviews.text: I had been using Drunk Elephants Marula oil and then discovered this. It’s not quite as luxurious as the DE product but it is great considering it’s 10x less in price. The pump and bottle are nice. Great facial/body oil to put on over lotions and seal in the good products you put on. I think it’s definitely worth a try
customer_reviews.author: Colorado88

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive and dry skin. I have tried lots of facial oils. This one is one of my favorites! After trying out for a couple of weeks, I noticed that my skin became more soft, smooth, and clear. It doesn't leave my skin feeling greasy either since it absorbs quickly into the skin. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Danny T

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Heavy - Doesn't Absorb
customer_reviews.text: This product is fairly useless. I would suggest going with a different brand. It is very, very heavy and doesn't absorb. Impossible to use on your skin. You may as well rub bacon fat or shortening on yourself. I have used it in my hair a few times now, but it also doesn't absorb. Throughout the day, I end up with the feeling that I have put olive oil on my head. It's that viscous. I'd suggest trying something different.
customer_reviews.author: Adam R. Dodson

customer_reviews.title: Broke me out and not as hydrating
customer_reviews.text: I have dry, dehydrated skin, and I feel like marula oil does not cut it for me. It just felt greasy but without hydration, and the smell was really strong (like gravy). After using it for a couple of weeks I started breaking out in multiple spots on my face. I personally would go back to squalane oil because it was more hydrating and didn't have a smell. BUT, YMMV, meaning that everyone's face is different! This could be amazing for someone else but not for me. I'm not slamming the manufacturer or the seller, I'm just slamming the product.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Capuli

customer_reviews.title: Omg if I could give this 100 stars I would.
customer_reviews.text: For those of us with dry skin and or crepey neck. This is the best moisturizer in the world. I spend over a thousand dollars a year on high in moisturizers. This inexpensive oil is now my go to night and day moisturizer. I don’t use anything else. My skin on my neck looks better and best of all my sensitive skin does not react at all by itching or turning red. Please please please try this if you have dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Whitten

customer_reviews.title: Marula oil provides the best skin care
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this oil. The description about this oil is 100 % correct. I use it at night and I add a few drops to my moisturizer lotion in the morning. I tried them all, and this is the best oil for me. And I am very happy with the seller. It was a 100 % perfect transaction.
customer_reviews.author: Siri

customer_reviews.title: nice but expansive
customer_reviews.text: Amazon used to carry Marula Oil from "Slice of Nature" which was half the price of this one. Both brands have nice Marula oil product. Only difference is cost. That's why I gave 4 star.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: I just got this but so far I love it!!! Does not leave my face greasy! Easy to apply makeup right over! I’ve also used it on my hands and they looks and feel so much better!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Sheerin

customer_reviews.title: Move Over Coconut Oil!
customer_reviews.text: Marula Oil is the new coconut oil for skin and hair. I am not fond of the smell of coconut oil and I don't really want to put something I can cook with on my face. In addition, coconut oil can and will clog pores. After cleansing your face, marula oil absorbs much faster than coconut oil, so you can apply moisturizer, primer and foundation without waiting. Marula oil leaves skin so soft and can be used as body oil after shower. The price point for 100% cold pressed virgin marula oil varies greatly and the cost of Newday is more than reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Lela U.

customer_reviews.title: Best oil for hydration
customer_reviews.text: Marula Oil is the best hydration oil out there. It reduces the appearance of wrinkles and hydrates on the first application.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: Marula your face!
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff. Decent price. Buying again. I was buying DE products but it’s done for such a small amount. This stuff does and is the same just better priced.
customer_reviews.author: Nik  R

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Huge bottle, great price! I am not sure of it’s claimed benefits yet, but I’ve just started using it. Very mild fragrance, faint smell. Goes on like any other oil and seems to take a while to absorb. I now use less than I had been.
customer_reviews.author: Lyngaaskhan

customer_reviews.title: awesome oil
customer_reviews.text: love this marula oil after reading much about it's many contributions to softer skin, nails, face and even my hair. I actually mix it with my current moisturizer for an added kick and love the results, also affordably priced
customer_reviews.author: S. Woolard

customer_reviews.title: I love this oil
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil! I've been using it on my face. No break-outs. My skin is smooth and soft. It absorbs fairly well, but not perfectly, but it is oil afterall. I like that they have is in a brown glass container to protect it from light. I've also used the Marula oil on my hair with good results.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Wasn’t completely filled; a bit watery
customer_reviews.text: This oil is okay. I won’t say it’s fake. But it’s not as high quality as I’ve used. And to top it off they didn’t even fill it up all the way it was almost halfway empty and it’s not because it broke or spilled.
customer_reviews.author: Dev

customer_reviews.title: Best alkaline oil
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that this marula oil is natural alkaline with no additives. I use it on my skin and my 4 month old. Marula is high in oxygen which nourish the skin. Definitely buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Giovanni

customer_reviews.title: Will but again and again!
customer_reviews.text: I love this facial oil! The oil is very light and absorbed into the skin quickly. The best feature is the push nozzle! No more having to use a dropper when your hands are already oily.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsi maverick04

customer_reviews.title: Miraculous
customer_reviews.text: Love this!! Use it with retin-a and it really helps add moisture back. So glad to have found it. I try to put it on a little while before going to sleep and in the morning before makeup so it soaks in
customer_reviews.author: Marie Mack

customer_reviews.title: Best Oil Ever
customer_reviews.text: Excellent oil! I use it on my face, neck and hair!!! My skin looks amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Eva Gemme

customer_reviews.title: but it felt good on my skin
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for two months and i did not see an improvement in my skin or hair, but it felt good on my skin. But I can use coconut oil to do the job.
customer_reviews.author: LaTanya

customer_reviews.title: Every day use and I adore it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I use it twice a day and I have noticed a firmer softer surface quality to my face and hands!
customer_reviews.author: Free to be

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite beauty product
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite beauty product. I have been using for a moisturizer and under my makeup. A little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Weimann

customer_reviews.title: This oil is wonderful!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Marula is magical! I no longer have dry feet and I use it on my grandsons knees and elbows to take away the dry gray skin. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: GrambaLisa

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: This Marina oil is very good quality. I really don’t need to use very much as a little goes a long ways. I definitely will reorder this product. I also have been using it on my dry, thick curly hair and love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizes quickly
customer_reviews.text: This stops that dry feeling after you wash your face. It sinks in fast and does not have a heavy greasy feeling.
customer_reviews.author: NoCatchMax

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I love marula oil, and was excited to see this larger bottle being sold for a decent price. Overall I really enjoy this product, but the pump doesn't provide as much control as I would like.
customer_reviews.author: Alana

customer_reviews.title: Pump not working well
customer_reviews.text: The pump doesn’t work good Have to pump few times for oil to come out
customer_reviews.author: UWS senior

customer_reviews.title: perfect!
customer_reviews.text: glass bottle ,came tightly nicely packed no problems fast shipping great oil love !!
customer_reviews.author: Yaaamazon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: No odor smell and not too heavy oil. Makes my skin moisture and shiny. I tried lots of oil skin care but I highly recommended this one.
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: 3 in 1
customer_reviews.text: Love this oil. My face as well as my hands are silky smooth. Two pumps every morning and every night is all it takes. Dry cuticles no more either. So, I save on facial moisturizer, hand lotion and cuticle cream.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light weight oil
customer_reviews.text: Light oil, great barrier to keep moisture in and pollution out!
customer_reviews.author: devon roberts

customer_reviews.title: Good, but be careful if you have sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: It works like other marula oils. I have sensitive skin and this causes my face to be flushed after a week of use.
customer_reviews.author: werkfor6

customer_reviews.title: Great product for moisturizing and mixing with essential oils.
customer_reviews.text: It does what I needed to do when I mix it with my essential oil‘s and other carrier oils for my beard. It does what moisturizing it should for the size of the bottle it’s equivalent for the money.
customer_reviews.author: dbutcher

customer_reviews.title: Awesome so far!
customer_reviews.text: This oil is very light and absorbs better than any other oil I've tried!
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Mehhh caused a breakout
customer_reviews.text: Broke my face and my sisters face out with tiny little bumps all over. I have more oily / combo skin and my sister has more of a dry/normal skin. I’ll go back to using the Drunken Elephant Marula oil that I had been previously using, this is way cheaper but clearly not the same.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Excellent face oil
customer_reviews.text: Perfect face oil. Not greasy. Light. Feels good on my skin. I've only used it a few times in my hair, but I liked that too. Very pleased with this oil.
customer_reviews.author: jac

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for skin
customer_reviews.text: Twice as much in Sephora This is superior quality At a reasonable price I order two at a time
customer_reviews.author: teri

customer_reviews.title: Definite nail improvement.
customer_reviews.text: Used it mainly for my hair and nails. Made my fingernails less brittle and prone to breakage. Saw slight improvement of my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic all over moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Nice thin oil, spreads well over my face though tends to sit on the surface for a little longer than my previous Marula oil product. Has no smell or color which I like. Great service and speedy delivery with follow up. Will definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: JEE

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite skin moisturizer in the winter. I mix it in with my regular lotion to make it richer. It’s non sticky and sinks in well.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Pratt

customer_reviews.title: This product works for me!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product and will order again. My skin seems to drink it in and I can feel the difference. Give it a try!
customer_reviews.author: Joelle E. Pehrson

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I feel like marula oil alone isn’t as good as an oil blend
customer_reviews.author: AshleyRochestie

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product!! A little thicker than I’d hoped for but feels amazing on your skin!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Del Castillo

customer_reviews.title: What a great deal! I love it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this oil because I bought expensive brand for $72! Way over price! I tried this brand and very impressed with the quality. It really moisturizes my skin without breaking me out. Save money for 4.oz size. What a great deal! I love it....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy
customer_reviews.text: Much heavier than I expected Would not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful quality / natural product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Newday Essence Marula oil for a couple weeks now, & I have seen a definite change. My skin is more supple & vibrant appearing. It seems to soothe my Rosaces as well. Quality container, packaging, sources & company
customer_reviews.author: AJ Rose

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: The quantity is a terrific steal. But also, compared to other marula oils I've tried, this doesn't seem to absorb as quickly or effortlessly. This product is just greasier than I was expecting. Nothing is wrong with it, per se, but I've delegated this bottle for use on body. Will be ordering a different brand for my face, where it matters most.
customer_reviews.author: WTop Contributor: Fountain Pens

customer_reviews.title: Not pure! wrong color, wrong texture!
customer_reviews.text: This was more expensive than other brands so I assumed it is better quality! Wrong! it is very thin, no color at all! pure Marula has a yellowish color and is thicker than water!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, quality and price
customer_reviews.text: Great product, great price, great quality. I’ve used other Marula oils with half the product and double the price from “high end” brands like Drunk Elephant Marula Oil. This works better, and is a fraction of the price plus you get more product. Don’t waste your money on overpriced brands with fancy but useless packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Raul Henderson

customer_reviews.title: GREAT LIGHT MARULA OIL FOR SKIN AND HAIR
customer_reviews.text: I USE IT EVERY DAY WHEN I DON'T WEAR MAKEUP. IT GIVES ME A DEWY APPEARANCE. AT NIGHT I ALTERNATE CREAMS AND THE OIL. MUST BUY. IT WORKS IN THE HAIR ALSO, I WRAP MY HAIR WITH IT AT NIGHT COVERED IN SILK AND I WAKE UP WITH READY TO GO HAIR. NO BED HEAD. GREAT CONDITIONER. I SPENT A LOT OF MINEY ON HAIR AND SKIN PRODUCTS WHEN THE ANSWER TO MOST OF THE PROBLEMS LIES IN THIS BOTTLE.
customer_reviews.author: rhoda davila

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the product now for almost and month and find my skin quality has improved. Fine lines are reduced in appearance, texture improved also. I wear a generous amount before I go to bed and then a thin layer 30 minutes before I put on makeup. I like the way my makeup goes on over it and the softness of my skin.
customer_reviews.author: CarrieOBrien

customer_reviews.title: Best oil I've tried!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite oil thus far, and I've tried rosehip seed oil, argan oil, avocado oil, evening primrose oil, baobab oil, grapeseed oil, kukui nut oil, coconut oil, and vitamin E oil. Baobab oil is my second favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Susan L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I believe this is a high quality oil. My skin looks and feels amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great Price and a Nice product!
customer_reviews.text: I like Marula Oil for massaging my face. This oil has a good consistency for using it this way. A little really goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Lenore Holden

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Great at protecting my treated hair
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Great at protecting my treated hair. No problems, totally satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie L Enyart

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my face everyday and love it
customer_reviews.author: E. Macias

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: Used this for face moisturiser and it is very gentle on the skin and easily absorbed,
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn C.

product_meta.title: Marula Oil 100% Pure Virgin (4 oz Large) Cold Pressed Unrefined Moisturizer for Face, Skin, Hair and Nail
feature_bullets: Pure - 100% Cold-pressed in 4 oz GLASS BOTTLE virgin/unrefined without chemical additives, bleaches, preservatives
Wild-crafted - It is wild, native and organic by its own nature. Not farmed or sprayed with any kind of pesticides
Lightweight - Super fast-absorbing, Non greasy with natural slightly nutty odor, Packed with nutrients and antioxidants
For Face - After Cleansing, apply 2-3 drops and gently massage onto face, neck, and décolleté morning and night
For Hair - Apply a small amount to damp or dry hair, concentrating on the ends to help protect your hair
